lyrics.lyric: All I ever wanted to do was do right things
lyrics.tlyric: 我本就只想做正确的事情

lyrics.lyric: I never wanted to be the king, I swear
lyrics.tlyric: 从未想过加冕称王，我发誓

lyrics.lyric: All I ever wanted to do was save your life
lyrics.tlyric: 我本就只想拯救你的生命

lyrics.lyric: I never wanted to grab a knife, I swear
lyrics.tlyric: 从未想过拿起屠刀，我发誓
再无泪水，无所畏惧，我心如焚，烈焰熊熊

lyrics.lyric: You tell me what have I missed
lyrics.tlyric: 你告诉我，我究竟错失了什么

lyrics.lyric: Still wandering in the deep mist
If I lose it all, slip and fall
lyrics.tlyric: 如果我失去所有，一败涂地

lyrics.lyric: If I lose it all, lose it all, lose it all
lyrics.tlyric: 如果我失去一切，失去所有

lyrics.lyric: If I lose it all outside the wall
lyrics.tlyric: 如果我在墙外失去了一切
我也会视死如归，奋不顾身

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.00] 作词 : MAH
[00:00.34] 作曲 : SiM
[00:00.68] 编曲 : SiM
[00:01.03]Rumbling rumbling it's coming
[00:04.41]Rumbling rumbling
[00:07.28]Beware
[00:13.48]Coming for you
[00:20.60]All I ever wanted to do was do right things
[00:24.56]I never wanted to be the king I swear
[00:30.69]All I ever wanted to do was save your life
[00:34.26]I never wanted to grab a knife I swear
[00:41.74]Tearless fearless burning burning
[00:47.94]You tell me what have I missed
[00:51.02]Still wandering in the deep mist
[00:56.85]If I lose it all slip and fall
[01:00.55]I will never look away
[01:03.27]If I lose it all lose it all lose it all
[01:09.98]If I lose it all outside the wall
[01:13.28]Live to die another day
[01:16.95]I don't want anything
[01:18.95]I'm just here to
[01:23.36]Beware
[01:24.51]Rumbling rumbling it's coming
[01:27.32]Rumbling rumbling

tlyric.lyric:
[by:南归_T]
[00:01.03]地鸣 地鸣 即将来临
[00:04.41]地鸣 地鸣
[00:07.28]做好觉悟
[00:13.48]目标正是你
[00:20.60]我本就只想做正确的事情
[00:24.56]许下誓言 从未想过加冕称王
[00:30.69]我本就只想要拯救你的生命
[00:34.26]许下誓言 从未想过拿起武器
[00:41.74]泪干冷漠 无所畏惧 斗志正熊熊燃烧
[00:47.94]你告诉我所错过的东西
[00:51.02]我仍在迷雾中徘徊
[00:56.85]若我失去所有 一败涂地
[01:00.55]我绝不会逃避
[01:03.27]如果我失去了一切的一切
[01:09.98]如果我在墙外失去了所有
[01:13.28]我仍会继续活下去
[01:16.95]别无所求
[01:18.95]这正是我在此的理由
[01:23.36]做好觉悟
[01:24.51]地鸣 地鸣 即将来临
[01:27.32]地鸣 地鸣
